head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CAMPBELL, JOHN COERT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CAMPBELL, JOHN COERT

block.p: CAMPBELL-John Coert. Husband of Mary (Hillis). Father of Allan R. (Auburndale, MA) and A. Bruce (Denver, CO). Memorial service on Saturday, July 22 at 11am in The Second Congregational Church, 43 Highland Ave, Cohasset, MA 02025. Contributions to: The Second Congregational Church or the Cohasset Historical Society, 14 Summer St, Cohasset, MA 02025. Council on Foreign Relations/Department of State.
